generated_text:
{
    "name": "Creamy Garlic Chicken Alfredo",
    "recipe": {
        "title": "Creamy Garlic Chicken Alfredo",
        "serving_size": 4,
        "ingredients": {
            "Garlic": "4 cloves, minced",
            "Chicken Wings": "1 lb",
            "Butter": "1/4 cup",
            "Parmesan": "1 cup, grated",
            "Milk": "1 cup",
            "White Rice": "1 cup",
            "Olive Oil": "2 tbsp",
            "Salt": "1 tsp",
            "Pepper": "1/2 tsp",
            "Lemon": "1, juiced",
            "Parsley": "2 tbsp, chopped",
            "Angel Hair Pasta": "8 oz",
            "Black Pepper": "1/2 tsp",
            "Garlic Powder": "1 tsp",
            "Chicken Broth": "1/2 cup",
            "Spinach": "2 cups",
            "Brown Sugar": "1 tbsp",
            "Shredded Cheese": "1 cup"
        },
        "cook": [
            "Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).",
            "Season chicken wings with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.",
            "Bake chicken wings in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until fully cooked.",
            "Cook angel hair pasta according to package instructions; drain and set aside.",
            "In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.",
            "Stir in milk, Parmesan, lemon juice, parsley, salt, and pepper. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce thickens.",
            "Add cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat with the sauce.",
            "In another skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add spinach and cook until wilted.",
            "Serve pasta topped with chicken wings and sautéed spinach. Sprinkle with brown sugar and shredded cheese.",
            "Enjoy your creamy garlic chicken alfredo!"
        ]
    }
}
